about_the_game:
Join the Lumanite Association to help rid the world of dangerous monsters. Learn new abilities, and upgrade your equipment in order to work your way up from a Novice to the strongest Lumanite there was, meeting friends and challenging bosses along the way. Take it further by crafting mechanical structures that help you blast through huge numbers of monsters! Bring these preparations from the overworld down into the interconnected, Metroidvania-style area known as the Nether.

Game Features


  • Complete quests, and encounter bosses throughout an open world
  • Level up your character in your customized training rooms
  • Gather materials to craft and upgrade equipment
  • Build mechanical structures to help you defeat large numbers of monsters, or to automate the training process
  • Gather character enhancements that synergize to adapt to different scenarios
  • Cook delicious dishes to attract a pet that will help you fight
  • Explore the interconnected world of the Nether, and obtain new abilities
  • Craft structures within the Nether that help you explore deeper
  • Customize your character with different hair, face, and clothing styles
